content: And what’s really happening in Q4 for us is like Paul said, demand is strong, channel inventory still needs to be replenished, and we have got a couple of very specific large programs that are going into play in Q4 also that have started ramping up -- that would start ramping up in Q3. It’s a little bit light of what we talked about in July, but at 4.4% to 4.6%, I would say, nice strong margins above last year’s margins with a $100 million of operating profit growth. I would say, Steve, first, at this revenue that we have done in Q2 of over $6.2 billion, I would say -- and at a 4% revenue growth year-over-year, we’d still be very high compared to most of our peers and compared to what most companies that have such strong hardware composition are doing.
